title: Trouble in Watopia: Zwift Slashes Staff, Loses Co-CEO in Further Round of Workforce Reductions
content:
'Growth has not rebounded at a fast enough pace': Co-CEO Kurt Biedler steps away amid latest round of layoffs at embattled online giant.

Read the full article at Trouble in Watopia: Zwift Slashes Staff, Loses Co-CEO in Further Round of Workforce Reductions on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
